36065.ここから 外に出られそうだ。\nレイダメテスの外に 出ますか？<yesno><c:
From here, you should be able to leave. Leave outside
Reidametes?<yesno><close>

39119.旅の扉は チカラを失っているようだ。: The teleportal seems to be losing its power.

45140.台座に灯されていた 緑の炎が消えた。:
The green flame that was lighting the pedestal, has
extinguished.

45141.台座に灯されていた 赤い炎が消えた。:
The red flame that was lighting the pedestal, has
extinguished.

45142.台座に灯されていた 青い炎が消えた。:
The blue flame that was lighting the pedestal, has
extinguished.

45143.どこか遠くで 重々しい振動が起こるのを感じた。: Somewhere far away, a serious shaking could be felt.

45386.緑に燃えるは 怨嗟の炎。\nすべての炎が消えし時 道は開かれん。:
Burning green is the Fire of Resentment. The path
won't open until all the flames are extinguished.

45387.赤に燃えるは 憎悪の炎。\nすべての炎が消えし時 道は開かれん。:
Burning red is the Fire of Hatred. The path won't
open until all the flames are extinguished.

45388.青に燃えるは 絶望の炎。\nすべての炎が消えし時 道は開かれん。:
Burning blue is the Fire of Despair. The path won't
open until all the flames are extinguished.
